Sentencas: The perovskite structure materials used as an oxygen ion conductor in solid oxide fuel cells have been widely studied.
Titulo: Realizing oxygen ion conduction in perovskite structure NaNbO3 by A-site Bismuth doping

Sentencas: Here, we report novel property of NaNbO3-based ceramics about oxygen ion conduction.
Titulo: Realizing oxygen ion conduction in perovskite structure NaNbO3 by A-site Bismuth doping

Sentencas: The grain size is significantly increased as well as the structural symmetry is enhanced with bismuth doping.
Titulo: Realizing oxygen ion conduction in perovskite structure NaNbO3 by A-site Bismuth doping

Sentencas: Based on the analysis of AC impedance in serial pO(2), nearly pure oxide ions conduction characteristic was realized in Na0.4Bi0.2NbO3 composition.
Titulo: Realizing oxygen ion conduction in perovskite structure NaNbO3 by A-site Bismuth doping

Sentencas: Remarkably, electrical conductivity of Na0.4Bi0.2NbO3 sharply increased 3 orders of magnitude to 0.01 S/cm at 700 degrees C compared to that of NaNbO3 oxides.
Titulo: Realizing oxygen ion conduction in perovskite structure NaNbO3 by A-site Bismuth doping

Sentencas: This study not only discovered the novel ionic conductor properties of Na0.4Bi0.2NbO3, but also provided a new candidate for the solid electrolyte of medium-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Realizing oxygen ion conduction in perovskite structure NaNbO3 by A-site Bismuth doping
